message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this price reflects its worth.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to save a bit more if possible.
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? This is a very competitive price for a product of this value.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8,800? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
